posts.post_title: WTB T207 Fisher White Cap and Chet Hoff
posts.post_content: Looking for these cards in SGC 30 or 40 type of condition.  I know the Hoff is brutal so I'll probably take anything that's not mangled.  Thanks!
Sorry, i thought I posted on the buy/sell/trade!
